languages.text: "Я авторизовал расследование с применением всех необходимых мер для поиска скрывшихся хаосопоклонников. Какие именно меры применяли офицеры — мне не докладывали". {n}Абеляр хмурится, явно недовольный необходимостью отчитываться в присутствии рабочих.{/n} "Тем не менее, я уверен, что действия офицеров были оправданы. Культисты — это вам не пьяные грузчики, это враг и угроза кораблю. Их нейтрализация требует жестких мер".

"I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."
languages.original_text: "Я авторизовал расследование с применением всех необходимых мер для поиска скрывшихся хаосопоклонников. Какие именно меры применяли офицеры — мне не докладывали". {n}Абеляр хмурится, явно недовольный необходимостью отчитываться в присутствии рабочих.{/n} "Тем не менее, я уверен, что действия офицеров были оправданы. Культисты — это вам не пьяные грузчики, это враг и угроза кораблю. Их нейтрализация требует жестких мер".

traits.locale_text: "I authorized the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshipers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Heretic pirates are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralizing them demands decisive action."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I authorized the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshipers hiding in this sector. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我授权采取一切必要措施，揪出这片区域中混沌的崇拜者，但军官并没有向我报告他们具体采取了哪些举动。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头。很显然，他感到很不满，因为他不得不在这些工人面前进行解释。{/n}“但尽管如此，我相信他们的行为是合理的。异端分子可不是什么喝醉了的装卸工人。他们是敌人，会对我们的船构成威胁。我们需要果断采取行动，消灭他们。”
languages.original_text: "I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."

traits.locale_text: “我授权采取一切必要措施，揪出这片区域中混沌的崇拜者，但军官并没有向我报告他们具体采取了哪些举动。”{n}阿贝拉德皱起眉头。很显然，他感到很不满，因为他不得不在这些工人面前进行解释。{/n}“但尽管如此，我相信他们的行为是合理的。异端海盗可不是什么喝醉了的装卸工人。他们是敌人，会对我们的船构成威胁。我们需要果断采取行动，消灭他们。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Autoricé el uso de las medidas que fueran necesarias para localizar a los adoradores del Caos que se ocultaban en este sector. No se me informó sobre los pasos concretos que tomaron los oficiales». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño, evidentemente molesto al tener que dar explicaciones delante de los trabajadores.{/n} «En cualquier caso, estoy convencido de que sus acciones estaban justificadas. Los cultistas no son estibadores borrachos: son el enemigo y una amenaza para la nave al completo. Necesitamos tomar acciones decisivas para neutralizarlos».
languages.original_text: "I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."

traits.locale_text: «Autoricé el uso de las medidas que fueran necesarias para localizar a los adoradores del Caos que se ocultaban en este sector. No se me informó sobre los pasos concretos que tomaron los oficiales». {n}Abelard frunce el ceño, evidentemente molesto al tener que dar explicaciones delante de los trabajadores.{/n} «En cualquier caso, estoy convencido de que sus acciones estaban justificadas. Los piratas herejes no son estibadores borrachos: son el enemigo y una amenaza para la nave al completo. Necesitamos tomar acciones decisivas para neutralizarlos».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「私は、この区域に隠れている渾沌の崇拝者の居場所を突き止めるために、あらゆる必要な手段を用いることを許可しました」{n}アベラルドは顔をしかめた。労働者たちの前で説明しなければならないことに明らかに不満そうだ。{/n}「とはいえ、彼らの行動が正当であったことは確かです。教団は酔っ払いの労働者ではありません…彼らは敵であり、船にとっての脅威なのです。彼らを無力化するには、断固とした行動が必要となるのですから」
languages.original_text: "I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."

traits.locale_text: 「私は、この区域に隠れている渾沌の崇拝者の居場所を突き止めるために、あらゆる必要な手段を用いることを許可しました」{n}アベラルドは顔をしかめた。労働者たちの前で説明しなければならないことに明らかに不満そうだ。{/n}「とはいえ、彼らの行動が正当であったことは確かです。教団は酔っ払いの労働者ではありません…彼らは敵であり、船にとっての脅威なのです。彼らを無力化するには、断固とした行動が必要となるのですから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe den Einsatz aller notwendigen Maßnahmen gestattet, um Chaos-Anhänger zu finden, die sich in diesem Sektor verbergen. Welche Schritt genau die Offiziere unternommen haben, wurde mir nicht gemeldet." {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn, offenkundig verärgert darüber, dass er sich vor den Ohren der Arbeiter rechtfertigen muss.{/n} "Ich bin aber überzeugt, dass ihr Vorgehen gerechtfertigt war. Kultisten sind keine betrunkenen Stauer — sie sind der Feind und eine Gefahr für das Schiff. Um sie zu neutralisieren, sind entschlossene Maßnahmen möglich."
languages.original_text: "I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe den Einsatz aller notwendigen Maßnahmen gestattet, um Chaos-Anhänger zu finden, die sich in diesem Sektor verbergen. Welche Schritt genau die Offiziere unternommen haben, wurde mir nicht gemeldet." {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn, offenkundig verärgert darüber, dass er sich vor den Ohren der Arbeiter rechtfertigen muss.{/n} "Ich bin aber überzeugt, dass ihr Vorgehen gerechtfertigt war. Ketzerische Piraten sind keine betrunkenen Stauer — sie sind der Feind und eine Gefahr für das Schiff. Um sie zu neutralisieren, sind entschlossene Maßnahmen möglich."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai ordonné aux officiers de retrouver les adorateurs du Chaos cachés dans le secteur par tous les moyens nécessaires, mais les mesures qu'ils ont prises en ce sens ne m'ont pas été communiquées. » {n}Abélard se renfrogne, manifestement contrarié d'avoir à se justifier en présence des ouvriers.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, je ne doute pas du bien-fondé de leurs agissements. Bien plus que de vulgaires débardeurs avinés, ces cultistes hérétiques représentent une menace pour l'ensemble du vaisseau. Aux grands maux les grands remèdes. »
languages.original_text: "I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai ordonné aux officiers de retrouver les adorateurs du Chaos cachés dans le secteur par tous les moyens nécessaires, mais les mesures qu'ils ont prises en ce sens ne m'ont pas été communiquées. » {n}Abélard se renfrogne, manifestement contrarié d'avoir à se justifier en présence des ouvriers.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, je ne doute pas du bien-fondé de leurs agissements. Bien plus que de vulgaires débardeurs avinés, ces pirates hérétiques représentent une menace pour l'ensemble du vaisseau. Aux grands maux les grands remèdes. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bu sektörde saklanan Kaos mensuplarının bulunması için gerekli tüm tedbirlerin alınmasını talep ettim. Subayların izlediği yola dair ayrıntılar bana bildirilmedi." {n}Abelard, işçilerin önünde hesap vermekten rahatsız olduğunu belli edecek şekilde yüz ekşitiyor.{/n} "Öte yandan yaptıklarının bir açıklaması elbet vardır. Tarikatçılar, ayyaş istifçilerden ibaret değildir. Bu gemiye tehdit teşkil eden düşmanlardır. Etkisiz hâle getirilmeleri için kati eylemler gerekir."
languages.original_text: "I authorised the use of all necessary measures to locate Chaos worshippers hiding in this sector. The specific steps taken by the officers were not reported to me." {n}Abelard frowns, clearly disgruntled at having to explain himself in the workers' presence.{/n} "Nevertheless, I am certain that their actions were justified. Cultists are no drunken stevedores — they are the enemy and a threat to the ship. Neutralising them demands decisive action."

Subayların izlediği yola dair ayrıntılar bana bildirilmedi." {n}Abelard, işçilerin önünde hesap vermekten rahatsız olduğunu belli edecek şekilde yüz ekşitiyor.{/n} "Öte yandan yaptıklarının bir açıklaması elbet vardır.
